input.sentences: we love to see the fireworks every year .
they always have such pretty colors .
i love how they light up the night sky .
the many different color explosions are so amazing .
we always have such a great time and we look forward to it every year .
output.sentences: I love to go see the fireworks on July 4th.
There are always so many pretty colors.
The sky at night is when I love to see them.
With each explosion there are amazing colors.
I look forward to a time when I can see them again.
